mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tbl ( title , content , viewQty , likeQty , createDt , createId , deleteFlag) VALUES ( #{title} , #{content} , 0 , 0 , #{createDt} , #{createId} , false)
mapper.select: SELECT id , title , content , viewQty , likeQty , createDt , createId , updateDt , updateId , deleteDt , deleteId , deleteFlag FROM board_tbl WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
